about: Digital health leader with over 12 years of experience spanning research, consulting, teaching, and technology leadership. Expertise in health data interoperability, data science, and digital health product development. PhD in Health Data Science with 9+ publications and implementations across 13 countries.
about_headline: Bridging pharmacy, data science, and digital health leadership.
about_description: Healthcare needs to be safer and more efficient. With a combined background in Pharmaceutical Sciences and Health Informatics, my ambition is to use technology to improve patient safety, to increase treatment efficacy and to improve care efficiency. As a researcher, consultant, and educator, I bring a multidisciplinary perspective to every challenge.
